en-US.title: Dr. Kevin Hatfield's Clinic
en-US.description: Dr. Kevin Hatfield's clinic provides individualized and inclusive healthcare for all, including special considerations to the needs of transgender, gender-variant, and LGBT patients. They offer preventive medicine, adolescent, pediatric, and men's health care with an emphasis on integrating physical, mental, and spiritual wellness.

address: 509 Olive Way Suite 900, Seattle, WA 98101, USA
